report.title: Record attributes for verification wih hiddens
report.description: Report used to retrieve custom attributes of an occurrence record which are not included in a list of attributes to ignore.
report.query: select DISTINCT ON (av.id) o.id, 'Record' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, oaw.weight as w1, fsb1.weight as w2, fsb2.weight as w3, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN 'Text' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Lookup List' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Integer' WHEN 'B' THEN 'Boolean' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Float' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Specific Date' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vague Date' ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN CASE WHEN substring(a.caption from (char_length(a.caption)-5) for 4) = 'link' AND substring(av.text_value from 0 for 4) = 'http' THEN '' || av.text_value || '' ELSE av.text_value END WHEN 'L' THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join occurrence_attribute_values av on av.occurrence_id=o.id and av.deleted=false join occurrence_attributes a on a.id=av.occurrence_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value left join occurrence_attributes_websites oaw on oaw.occurrence_attribute_id=a.id and oaw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=oaw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#) union select DISTINCT ON (av.id) o.id, 'Parent sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, saw.weight, fsb1.weight, fsb2.weight, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN 'Text' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Lookup List' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Integer' WHEN 'B' THEN 'Boolean' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Float' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Specific Date' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vague Date' ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE WHEN g.title IS NULL THEN CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I' THEN coalesce(l.name, av.int_value::varchar) WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END ELSE g.title END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=s.parent_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join sample_attributes_websites saw on saw.sample_attribute_id=a.id and saw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=saw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value left join groups g on g.id=av.int_value and a.system_function='group_id' left join locations l on a.system_function='linked_location_id' and l.id=av.int_value and l.deleted=false where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#) union select DISTINCT ON (av.id) o.id, 'Sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, saw.weight, fsb1.weight, fsb2.weight, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN 'Text' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Lookup List' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Integer' WHEN 'B' THEN 'Boolean' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Float' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Specific Date' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vague Date' ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE WHEN g.title IS NULL THEN CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I' THEN coalesce(l.name, av.int_value::varchar) WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END ELSE g.title END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=o.sample_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value left join sample_attributes_websites saw on saw.sample_attribute_id=a.id and saw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=saw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id left join groups g on g.id=av.int_value and a.system_function='group_id' left join locations l on a.system_function='linked_location_id' and l.id=av.int_value and l.deleted=false where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and (a.system_function<>'cms_user_id' or a.system_function is null) and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#)

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

param.name: attrs
param.description: CSV list of attributes to include or exclude. Lowercase.

param.name: testagainst
param.description: Test for fields to include or exclude using the caption or the system function of the custom attribute

param.name: operator
param.description: Do you want to include only the list of attributes you've defined, or exclude them?
